The Oblitercons:

::Dark One laughed::
"You, are threatening me?  In your old body, you fool.  You currently don't 
have that helpful factor right now!" 
"No one threatens us.  And we aren't going to die for your petty feud.  We 
want 50 pounds of energon, before we contiue."
